text: Which of the following is a correct statement about default VPC Network Access Control Lists (NACLs) and outbound traffic?

answers.text: Default NACLs are stateful and they block all outbound traffic by default.
Default NACLs are stateless and they allow all outbound traffic by default.
Default NACLs are stateless and they block all outbound traffic by default.
Default NACLs are stateful and they allow all outbound traffic by default.
